Parameter.Name: Negotiation
Parameter.Comment: Whether a negotiation protocol is used.

Parameter.Name: Protocol
Parameter.Comment: One of the TLS, CredSSP, or RDP.

Parameter.Name: domainName
Parameter.Comment: Domain of the tested RDP Server.

Parameter.Name: ServerName
Parameter.Comment: Computer name or IP of the tested RDP Server.

Parameter.Name: ServerUserName
Parameter.Comment: The user name of local host (RDP server).

Parameter.Name: ServerPort
Parameter.Comment: Port of RDP service on RDP Server.

Parameter.Name: ClientName
Parameter.Comment: Computer name or IP of the driver computer.

Parameter.Name: RDPVersion
Parameter.Comment: The version of the RDP intends to test, it should be one of 7.0, 7.1, 8.0, 8.1.
